Topic.Title: Toolbar overlapping the top of the compass

Posts.EditableText: I've recently tried adding the Toolbar options for Save and Load from this guide https://github.com/ThePix/QuestJS/wiki/Adding-a-toolbar but when I look at it its now mostly obscuring the top row of the control panel with the compass, how do I get it to shift the Compass panel down or to make the toolbar option hide itself away when not focused on?
Posts.HTML: I've recently tried adding the Toolbar options for Save and Load from this guide https://github.com/ThePix/QuestJS/wiki/Adding-a-toolbar but when I look at it its now mostly obscuring the top row of the control panel with the compass, how do I get it to shift the Compass panel down or to make the toolbar option hide itself away when not focused on?
